values: 陷阱；捕捉器；罗网；圈套；诡计；（难以逃脱的）困境；单马双轮轻便马车；<口>汽车；抛靶器；多向飞碟；<俚语>嘴巴；打击乐器；（管道中的）水封；（电子学中的）陷阱电路
夹住；卡住；使卡住；捕获（动物）；诱捕；设陷阱；设圈套；诱骗；使陷入困境；使落入险境；使陷入圈套；缠住；困住；绊住；把…逼进

synonym.mean: 诱捕；使…受限制；使…陷入困境

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 捕获的；陷入困境的；收集的；受到限制的
诱捕（trap的ing形式）；设陷阱；阻止；使密封于管内
设陷阱捕兽者；捕捉器；[矿业] 矿井风门开关管理员

word_mean_info__list.difference: 指根据法律或命令进行逮捕并予以监禁或拘留。
侧重指以突然、有力地动作迅速抓住或捉住。
普通用词，指捉住跑动或隐藏中的人或动物，一般指活捉。
指通过武力或计谋等，战胜抵抗而捉住敌人或动物。

word_group.brief_definition: 危险场所；危险建筑；危险车辆
困境；绝境；破旧肮脏、摇摇欲坠的建筑物
容易积灰尘的东西；聚尘物
近内场三柱门的守方球员

bilingual.source: This trap will help us catch the mouse.
bilingual.target: 这个陷阱会帮我们抓住老鼠。

bilingual.source: The police set a trap to trap the thief.
bilingual.target: 警察设下了一个陷阱来诱捕小偷。

bilingual.source: The mouse was caught in the trap.
The animal was harmed by the trap.

bilingual.target: 你聪明地避开了这个陷阱。
这个陷阱用奶酪做诱饵。

bilingual.source: Be careful not to fall into the trap.
He set a trap to catch the rat.
bilingual.target: 他设了一个陷阱来抓老鼠。
她巧妙地躲过了那个陷阱。

list.abstract: Trap是20世纪90年代早期在美国南部形成的一种嘻哈音乐。 其特点在于沉重的808鼓以2倍、3倍加速或连续奏出的hi-hats（踩镲）以及用铜管乐器、木管乐器、键盘乐器创造出如电影插曲般的弦乐，营造出一个整体阴暗、诡异、冷酷、迷幻的氛围。
《Trap》是韩国SM娱乐公司旗下Henry于2013年6月7日推出的首张solo专辑，主打曲《Trap》由同门师兄Super Junior圭贤和师弟SHINee泰民参与feat并出演MV，公布MV当天Henry在KBS音乐银行进行solo出道舞台。

yingyinNormal.en: It was a trap. That's an understatement.
yingyinNormal.zh: 葬礼是个陷阱。这说法太委婉了。

yingyinNormal.en: Do I really make you feel those things? It's not a trap.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我真让你觉得幸福自信吗？又不是陷阱啦。

yingyinNormal.en: An ambush. A trap. Set by humans. I escaped and took this form.
yingyinNormal.zh: 人类设下陷阱突袭我，我逃走并化身成这副模样。

yingyinNormal.en: I suspect that's a trap. No, it isn't. I think she's knows that she's being unreasonable.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我怀疑这是个陷阱。不是的，我认为她知道自己这样太不讲理了。

yingyinNormal.en: My guess is it never was. They knew we were coming. They ambushed us. The visions were a trap.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我猜它从来就没在那儿，它们知道我们要来，它们伏击了我们，幻象就是个陷阱。

yingyinNormal.en: You know, by the way, this could be a trap. Ok? The Kree Purists, the Ravagers, they all want us dead. I know, but... But what?
yingyinNormal.zh: 仔细想想，这可能是个陷阱。克里纯种主义者，掠夺者，他们都想要我们的命。我知道，但是...但是什么？

yingyinNormal.en: Why is it different? You always said: Stay away from the man village, because you might fall in a trap, or get eaten, or get hurt by flying rocks.
yingyinNormal.zh: 为什么不一样？你总说要离人类的村子远一点，有可能会掉陷阱里，或者被吃掉，或者被石头砸伤。

yingyinNormal.en: Why fixate on Culverton Smith? He's had his obsessions before, of course, but this goes a bit further than setting a man-trap for Father Christmas. Do it. Ask him.
yingyinNormal.zh: 为什么执迷于卡尔福顿·史密斯？他以前也有过执迷，但这件事可不像，给圣诞老人下陷阱那么简单。快点。问他。

yingyinNormal.en: No way. That's a great idea. Which school, Ridgemont or Faber? Fast Times at Ridgemont High, not John Hughes. It's a trap. Faber College from Animal House.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不会吧。这主意太棒了。哪所学校，雷奇蒙德还是费伯？《雷奇蒙德中学时光》不是约翰·休斯导的。这是个陷阱。费伯学院则在《动物屋》。

yingyinNormal.en: Wait. Wait. I've set a trap for them when they use the next bomb. When they claim responsibility for the next bombing, they'll use a code word, telling the police they're IRA.
yingyinNormal.zh: 等一下！等一下。我给他们设了一个陷阱，他们下次搞爆炸袭击的时候，在袭击承认承担责任时侯，会使用暗号，告诉警察他们就是IRA。

yingyinNormal.en: Sorry? I finally chewed my leg out of that bear trap.
yingyinNormal.zh: 遗憾？我终于可以离开那个苦牢了。

yingyinNormal.en: Now what do we do? We go down the trap door. Tonight.
yingyinNormal.zh: 现在怎么办？去活板门下面，今晚。

yingyinNormal.en: What is the matter with you? Do you want to fall into the trap? Do you want to fall into the trap? You did not drop any socks.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你哪根筋不对？你又想跳回去自找苦吃？你根本没掉袜子。

yingyinNormal.en: Who'd you put your money on? Oh, I'm not gonna fall into that trap. You.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你赌谁赢？我才不会上当。当然是你。

yingyinNormal.en: To grow their crops, they hand carved rice paddies into the mountains to trap the water.
yingyinNormal.zh: 为了种植庄稼，她们用双手在一座座山上造出梯田，以此蓄水肥田。

yingyinNormal.en: The demons beneath the road? This is where we trap them. Sherrinford is more than a prison, or an asylum.
yingyinNormal.zh: 脚下的恶魔？我们就把他们困在那里。夏瑞福德不止是座监狱或精神病院，而是座堡垒。

yingyinNormal.en: Just like Rita's visions were a trap at Verdun. It could have killed me, but it didn't. It's after my blood.
yingyinNormal.zh: 就像瑞塔在凡尔登看到的幻象一样，它可以杀我，但没杀，它想要我的血。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah. What's, that? That is an integrated ion trap and time-of-flight mass spectrometer. Wow. High-techie-techie.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那个又是什么？那是集成离子阱和飞行时间质谱仪。哇，高科技含量。

yingyinNormal.en: And when you have a second later, I wanna show you why we don't just trap spiders under coffee mugs and leave them there.
yingyinNormal.zh: 待会儿新的服务生来了，我会告诉你为什么不能把蜘蛛困在马克杯底下就算了。

yingyinNormal.en: And all we have to do is listen for the pairs of trap doors banging shut and once we have heard three pairs, we know it's at the top.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们要做的是听一下活动门关上的声音，当我们听到有三声时，那就是到了顶层了。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 卡住; 夹住; 绊住

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 陷入困境的；受到限制的；捕获的

word_family.mean: n. 陷阱；罗网；捕捉装置；伏击；容器；存贮装置；单马双轮轻便马车；抛靶器；嘴巴；鼓或打击乐器；暗色岩

sense_info_list.en:
a piece of equipment for catching animals; 
to catch an animal in a trap

examination_example.sentence: The researchers <highlight>trapped</highlight> the robots in cages and gave the rats the opportunity to release them by pressing a lever.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 研究人员将机器人困在笼子里，并通过按压杠杆给老鼠释放它们的机会。

examination_example.sentence: This could lead to the rats better wanting the robot to return the favour when they get <highlight>trapped</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这可能会导致老鼠更希望机器人在它们被困时给予回报。

sense_info_list.en:
have something, typically a part of the body, held tightly by something so that it cannot move or be freed; 
an unpleasant situation from which it is hard to escape

examination_example.sentence: Congress or the Supreme Court could intervene to avoid <highlight>trapping</highlight> Internet regulation in technological anachronism.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 国会或最高法院可以进行干预，以避免互联网监管陷入技术时代不合时宜的困境。

examination_example.sentence: Thankfully, there is a way out of this <highlight>trap</highlight> – but it involves striking a subtle balance.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 令人欣慰的是，有一条出路可以走出这个困境——但这需要达成微妙的平衡。

examination_example.sentence: To combat the <highlight>trap</highlight> of putting a premium on being busy, Cal Newpor recommends building a habit of "deep work".
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为了克服强调忙碌的困境，卡尔·纽波建议养成“深度工作”的习惯。

examination_example.sentence: They're also from birds that live on farms using techniques to cultivate rich soils that can <highlight>trap</highlight> greenhouse gases.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它们也来自于农场上的鸟类，这些农场使用技术来培育能够吸收温室气体的肥沃土壤。

sense_info_list.en: have (something, typically a part of the body) held tightly by something so that it cannot move or be freed
sense_info_list.zh: 卡住; 夹住; 绊住

sense_info_list.en:
a situation in which people lie in wait to make a surprise attack; 
trick someone into something

由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>

a situation in which people lie in wait to make a surprise attack; 
trick someone into something
sense_info_list.zh: 圈套; 使上当; 诱骗

examination_example.sentence: To <highlight>trap</highlight> customers into buying the more pricey item.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 诱使顾客购买价格更高的商品。

examination_example.sentence: Arrhenius calculated the capability of carbon dioxide to <highlight>trap</highlight> heat in the Earth's atmosphere, but other chemists disagreed.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Arrhenius计算了二氧化碳在地球大气中捕获热量的能力，但其他化学家并不认同。

由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

sense_info_list.en: A trap is a trick that is intended to catch or deceive someone.
sense_info_list.zh: 圈套; 诡计; 骗局

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a piece of equipment for catching animals

examination_example.sentence: It took him a few minutes before Crow saw Deer caught in a <highlight>trap</highlight>（陷阱）made of ropes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 过了几分钟，乌鸦才看到鹿被绳子做成的陷阱困住了。

examination_example.sentence: Just then，the hunter came to check his <highlight>trap</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 就在这时，猎人来检查他的陷阱。

examination_example.sentence: At this time, they heard that Dick was caught in a <highlight>trap</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这时，他们听说迪克掉进了陷阱。

sense_info_list.en: If you are trapped somewhere, something falls onto you or blocks your way and prevents you from moving or escaping.

examination_example.sentence: Its main function is to send goods of up to 30 kilos to people <highlight>trapped</highlight> (困住) by an earthquake.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它的主要功能是向被地震围困的人们运送重达30公斤的货物。

examination_example.sentence: The camera  also acting as a detector (探测器) that finds <highlight>trapped</highlight> people and detects harmful gases.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这种摄像机还可以充当探测器，发现被困人员并检测有害气体。

examination_example.sentence: People who are <highlight>trapped</highlight> in the fallen buildings will be able to get supplies including oxygen (氧气) and water.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 被困在倒塌建筑中的人们将能够获得包括氧气和水在内的供应。

sense_info_list.en: When something traps gas, water, or energy, it prevents it from escaping.

examination_example.sentence: The gases build up and <highlight>trap</highlight> even more heat.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些气体积聚并吸收了更多的热量。

examination_example.sentence: The gases <highlight>trap</highlight>(储存)the sun's heat and act like blanket.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些气体储存太阳的热量，就像毯子一样。

examination_example.sentence: Carbon dioxide(二氧化碳)is one gas that <highlight>traps</highlight> heat.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 二氧化碳是一种吸收热量的气体
